hours._text:
When: Monday to Friday 9.30am-3.30pm
Tea/ coffee £1
Cake 50p
Every Tuesday 10.30-11.30am Happy Hour- free tea, coffee and cake.
In the café we also have a coat rail where people can donate a coat or where those who need a coat can just take one from the rail.

properties.title: St Edward the Confessor Church - Dringhouses

properties.address: Front Street, Acomb, York, YO24 3BX
properties.description: When: Fridays during term-time 10am - 1:30pmA warm space with free entry and low-cost tea, coffee (including barista drinks), squash and cakes. Family-friendly, with toys and plenty of highchairs. Free WiFi and power sockets available. The cafe has a community feel to it. You are welcome to stay for as long or as little as you want, and we are happy for you to bring your own food in. Open term-time only.
properties.title: Acomb Methodist Popup Cafe

properties.address: The Gateway Centre, Front Street, York, YO24 3BZ, YO24 3BZ
properties.description: Monday's, Tuesdays and Wednesdays 10am - 2pmThe Atrium at the Gateway Centre in Acomb, is open for anyone to come along and connect with other people and enjoy simple food and drink together free of charge. We are a warm space and have lots of crafts, games and activities on offer, as well as toys for toddlers and babies.We also have a quiet space that is open during the Atrium opening hours, where you are welcome to sit quietly, or to join us for short reflective sessions at 10am, 12noon and 2p

hours._text: Monday's, Tuesdays and Wednesdays 10am - 2pmThe Atrium at the Gateway Centre in Acomb, is open for anyone to come along and connect with other people and enjoy simple food and drink together free of charge. We are a warm space and have lots of crafts, games and activities on offer, as well as toys for toddlers and babies.We also have a quiet space that is open during the Atrium opening hours, where you are welcome to sit quietly, or to join us for short reflective sessions at 10am, 12noon and 2p

properties.title: The Atrium, Acomb
